Keyword.Name: RunSoapUICommand
Keyword.Description: Use command line to run SoapUI test case - Before running this KW - you need install SOAPUI and set environment path as http://imgur.com/jYq02l6

Param.Name: sProjectXMLFilePath
Param.Description: the SOAPUI .xml file - it include test suite and test case

Param.Name: sTestSuite
Param.Description: Test suite name in the Project file

Param.Name: sTestCase
Param.Description: Test case name need to run from test suite

Param.Name: sResultFolder
Param.Description: All result files of SOAPUI running will put in this folder

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional

Keyword.Name: CleanUp
Keyword.Description: This kw use to mark start cleanup

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DECLARE @email VARCHAR(255) = 'thaihoang85@ezitsol.com',|@userId uniqueidentifier;|SELECT @userId = UserId FROM Users u WHERE u.Email = @email|UPDATE Transactions|SET LockedByUser = NULL,

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: LockedOnDatetime = NULL|WHERE LockedByUser = @userId|DELETE TransactionTaskParticipants WHERE ParticipantId = @userId|DELETE TransactionTaskParticipantHistory WHERE ParticipantId = @userId

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DELETE UserGroupHistory WHERE UserId = @userId |DELETE UserGroups WHERE UserId = @userId|DELETE UserHistory WHERE UserId = @userId |DELETE Users WHERE UserId = @userId

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters

Keyword.Name: CleanUp

Keyword.Name: ExecuteSQLQueries
Keyword.Description: use sqlcmd to connect database on sql server, then execute multiple sql queries and check response

Param.Name: sConnectString
Param.Description: provide 5 params: hostname - port - user - pass - database name need to connect - separate each with "|"

Param.Name: sSQLqueries1
Param.Description: List of sql queries1 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DECLARE @email VARCHAR(255) = 'thaihoang85@ezitsol.com',|@userId uniqueidentifier;|SELECT @userId = UserId FROM Users u WHERE u.Email = @email|UPDATE Transactions|SET LockedByUser = NULL,

Param.Name: sSQLqueries2
Param.Description: List of sql queries2 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: LockedOnDatetime = NULL|WHERE LockedByUser = @userId|DELETE TransactionTaskParticipants WHERE ParticipantId = @userId|DELETE TransactionTaskParticipantHistory WHERE ParticipantId = @userId

Param.Name: sSQLqueries3
Param.Description: List of sql queries3 need to execute - separate each with "|"

Keyword.Param: DELETE UserGroupHistory WHERE UserId = @userId |DELETE UserGroups WHERE UserId = @userId|DELETE UserHistory WHERE UserId = @userId |DELETE Users WHERE UserId = @userId

Param.Name: sExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of expected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sUnExpectedResults
Param.Description: List of unexpected string need to verify - separate with "|"

Param.Name: sOptional
Param.Description: String Optional - use in case we need more parameters
